features: COMFORT：When it comes to the bedroom, comfort is key. You want the space you sleep in to be comfortable and warm, and fluffy rugs are a great way to transform your bedroom. Because the bedroom rug is made of extra soft velvet, there is a high-density foam interlayer that gives you a very soft touch.

NON-SLIP: This 2x6 rug has a non-slip bottom designed to prevent slips and falls. The bottom of the area rug has thousands of PVC dots which will keep the floor under your rug from being damaged while keeping your rug from sliding when you walk around.

CLEAN: Vacuuming is recommended once a week. If you have stains on your rugs for bedroom, you can do spot cleaning. You can use carpet shampoo on the carpet and scrub it clean with a small area using a soft bristle brush or rag.

DECORATIVE: Shaggy rugs are durable enough for any room in your home where you spend the most time, like the living room and bedroom. Get a fluffy shag rug to provide cozy comfort to a hardwood floor to deliver visual interest to an uninspired entryway.

NOTE: In order to facilitate delivery, our carpets are vacuum packed. So when you first open the package, there will be creases on the carpet, and the plush will not stand up. Don't worry, lay the carpet out on the floor for 3-5 days and it will regain its furry feel.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Advantages of Fosirug Area Rug Why Choose Fosirug Area Rug? An area rug provides cushioning and warmth, muffles sounds, and adds a decorative layer to a room. It's also great for covering up floors or old carpeting. The Fosirug Area Rug is a great way to transform your bedroom as, it's plush, cozy. These beautiful and incredibly soft area rugs will do just the trick while staying on budget. The simple shag design of this fluffy is made from a silky-smooth synthetic material that’s ideal for relaxing on.

Applicable Scenarios for Fosirug Rug Who Is This Rug Best For? Thisrug is best for kids who like to crawl on the floor, people with pets, people who like to stay in the bedroom, people who like to sit on the living room floor, people who like to decorate their rooms. Fluffy rugs are durable enough for any room in your home where you spend the most time
Previous page Next page 1 Super Soft 2 Long Plush 3 Easy Clean

An Area Rug Provides Cushioning and Warmth Comfort is Key Comfort is the key to a fluffy rug, but the most important thing is safety. The Fosirug Fluffy Rug use superior materials and advanced technology to ensure the comfort of the rug and the safety of the use of the product. Make your Home Feel More Homey The Fosirug Rugs for Bedroom have strengthened the density of the pile based on the original rug in order to ensure the comfort of use. The greater the density of the pile of the carpet, the better the touch feeling when it comes in contact with the skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color, perfect size and easy to vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: I loved the color and needed area rugs for my art room and my bedroom, so I ordered 2 of these. The price was definitely right.They look beautiful in both rooms, and they are easy to vacuum. They are nice and soft! I would buy again if I needed another area rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect bedroom rug!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to match the soft yellow in bedding and it is perfect in color. Color is true, so soft to the touch, great size and value. I bought another one in black to match the black in bedding. I would recommend this rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Okay so for starters this is definitely a little darker than I expected but not too bad. The rug is fluffy but not as thick as i expected either for context I bought a $120 rug from walmart also and its definitely not the same thickness but it was just taken out the packaging 10 min ago so maybe i need to let it fluff up? Idk Ill come back with an update tomorrow. As far as sizing I read the description and reviews and if youre anything like me you terrible at sizing. This is a 5x8 and it matches what I wanted. The rug is HUGE! Which is my favorite part. Definitely worth the $35

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This rug is so soft and cozy to walk on. Excellent quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's a great rug for the money, but...
reviews.reviewText: Large pretty furry black rug for my daughter's room and she loves it. Just know this is not a high quality dense rug. It is an unusual material, more like a stuffed animal or furry clothes, not something typically made for walking on. When you step on it, it's soft and lovely, but there is no density to the material so you sink to the underlayment and slide around a bit. It's a weird feeling and hard to explain. Perfect for a kids room to lay around on, not perfect for a main part of the house IMO. To clean it, it's light enough to just pick up and shake out - I'm not sure a vacuum would be advisable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars so soft and comfy!!
reviews.reviewText: Love it! Got the gray runner for a spare bedroom. It looks and feels great on my bare feet, which I go bare foot alot!! great price for the rug, you will not be sorry!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No one had images of the purple rug and I was afraid to purchase but so glad I did. The purple is such a beautiful, deep color. 7x10 covers so much space. The rug is super soft and therapeutic when you have socks on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for my toddlers room because it’s going to be ruined fast I’m sure but I wouldn’t repurchase for more common areas. It is like a fuzzy blanket in the ground almost. Not thick or even heavy enough to flatten out right but super soft and cute in his room.
